title: The Professor at the Breakfast Table Tragic Drama

content.question: In the fifth sentence of the third paragraph, the narrator’s extended description of the “scenery of a long tragic drama” affects the narrative by

choices.label: emphasizing the divinity-student’s dispassionate thought process
setting up a balance between the divinity-student’s thoughts and actions
implying that the Poor Relation’s remark is inaccurate
explaining why the divinity-student turned pale

content.answer: explaining why the divinity-student turned pale

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe how plot orders events in a narrative.
